effect @e[type=!player,family=!player,tag=!neutral,tag=!respawn_tool,r=2,c=1] slowness 1 10 true
effect @e[type=!player,family=!player,tag=!neutral,tag=!respawn_tool,r=2,c=1] weakness 1 10 true
scoreboard players random @s wp_random 1 5
